review:
Overview:
Overwatch(2) is such a great example of why these AAA titles in gaming are awful. Overwatch(2) lacks so many features you would want from a game like it is crazy. No meaningful progression, no rewards, 20$ skins, shitty battle-pass that does not give you premium credit.
Gameplay:
I have nearly 2000 hours in Overwatch and Overwatch(2). You a fan of fps games? Well, you will hate Overwatch(2). You a fan of MOBAs? Well, you will hate Overwatch(2). This game tries so hard to appeal to everyone that it fails to appeal to anyone. You will be slowed, you will be stunned, you will be one-shot and you will have 5 ults shit out at once and die with no counter-play. Switching to a single tank made the game VERY rock-paper-scissors like the game feels so taletless, at least for tank players. 
Monetization: 
Any self-respecting person will avoid Blizzard games. These games are Greed itself. Shit skins sold for 20 bucks and a shit battlepass sold for 10. You DO NOT earn premium coins from the battle-pass, you earn just regular coins that get you all the bad, ugly, or old items of the game. This game IS NOT free-to-play. The (PvE) or what is left of it is 15 bucks for 3 missions that I can't speak on because I will not subject myself to playing them.
About Blizzard:
The Overwatch(2) team has proven time and time again that they CANNOT balance this game. They are bringing CC abilities back for no real reason and have left characters like Kirko with broken abilities for 6 months. The game is a broken mess in terms of technical work and balance. You like playing a cool character like Mei? That sucks because Blizzard has just decided to nerf her and ruin her play-style for no reason! This happens all the time. Doom, Roadhog, Sombra, Sym, and so on all just killed for Blizzard balance. Blizzard has no idea if they want Overwatch(2) to be a competitive game or a usual game so at this point it is neither. 
Quick Notes:
-Matching making sucks and you will suffer.
-Comp is a joke.
-The new gamemode is just KOTH but worse.
Please respect yourself and play anything else over this.

Jestem szczerze zawiedziony tym, że dodano Overwatcha 2 na steam-a. Stworzenie drugiej części było istnym strzałem w kolano, wiele rzeczy zostało tutaj źle zrobionych jak na przykład: płatne postacie, usunięcie skrzynek ze skinami. Mówiąc o cenach skinów są bardzo drogie trzeba się liczyć z tym że jeżeli chcesz mieć jakiegoś fajnego skina musisz zapłacić 15 euro (w pierwszej odsłonie można było dostać takiego skina praktycznie za darmo). Tryb PvE to jakaś porażka bardzo nudne misje jak za taką cenę. Nowe postacie są nie zbalansowane, mapy są akurat ciekawe ale częstotliwość pojawiania się takowych jest bardzo mała. Podsumowywując: Dodanie Overwatcha na steam było czystym skokiem na kasę, wiele rzeczy zostało zrobionych źle, ceny skinów są chorendalnie wysokie, battle pass się nie zwraca, postacie są niezbalansowane a tryb PvE to jakiś żart. Na + oceniam mapy które są fajnie zrobione i przyjemnie się na nich gra. Daję ocenę pozytywną tylko z sentymentu do 1.

War richtig Hyped auf den Story Modus um diesen dann auch mit meinen Freunden zu zocken, aber Pustekuchen. 
Du musst verf**** nochmal für die Story zahlen. In welcher Welt zahlt man für einen Story Modus. Dickes L von Blizzard. Spiel wird erst wieder angefasst wenn das Kostenlos wird.
Cant wait for this game to be on Google Play.

Played for 300+ hours on this game through battle.net launcher and have been on and off since release in 2016. The core gameplay of its PvP is fun to play and engaging overall despite its issues. The balance and gameplay changes are somewhat questionable but that is a minor issue in regards to the real problems.

Besides the gameplay, it is unfortunate to see the path that this game has taken because of Activision/Blizzard's greed and deception. They somehow managed to downgrade and remove existing content from the first game and dish it back to the playerbase in a "sequel", giving the illusion of new content and change. Also, they wasted years of effort on a PvE mode that will never be fully realized and has been now squandered. I never cared that much for a PvE mode for Overwatch, but finding out that all the effort put into creating the PvE gamemode only for it to be scrapped almost entirely is a huge shame. Not to mention that the price for this new Invasion PvE gamemode costs less than a regular legendary hero skin when it was initially free to unlock by just playing the game is laughable.

I hate that I have to leave a bad review for this game because I think this game could become better under a better company, but I refuse to support what they have done to this game. I only hope that if this franchise is acquired fully through Microsoft's acquisition, then this game can reach a better state than it is currently in, because clearly Activision/Blizzard doesn't understand what they are doing with this franchise...

Pese a las polémicas y la falta de contenido, Overwatch siempre ha tenido un lugar de entre mis juegos favoritos. Revisando meramente los modos existentes y el contenido en turno en este nuevo port a Steam, realmente no hay una gran diferencia con el año anterior. Es divertido echar unas partidas rápidas y tener enfrentamientos intensos que pueden prolongarse porque alguien del equipo enemigo no se despega del payload. Ojalá el equipo encargado de Overwatch comience a tomar mejores decisiones con este gran juego.

[h1] You shouldn't play Overwatch 2 [/h1]

Overwatch 2 is like a 1.1 patch, but they removed content and delayed content. After six seasons they implement the PvE content that was the main content in the past with which they made commercial videos. They were lying and screwed the community. For sure you have to pay extra for these features.
But now PvP and the new battle pass system are the main focus. 
For PvP it is debatable if there were good changes or not, but overall many people are complaining about the competitive modes, because you cannot really climb in ranks and eSport was using the same heroes for there matches is saying everything. But Overwatch already didn't get any updates since the hero "Echo" in April 2020. If they would have put more afford into the game they could have continue with updating the game with balance patches, new maps and new heroes like they did with "OW2".
But instead the new game removed all good content.

[u] The biggest problem: money grabbing and unfair reward system. [/u]
Monetarization is a completely scam, you cannot get any good skins during grinding, because it takes more than a half year to play consistently. They fake discounts and use all - sadly - modern standards of grabbing money. The battle pass is a complete disaster. The prices are highly unfair and even old Overwatch 1 skins getting selled for ridiculous amounts.

But people are still paying money, [b] poor state of gaming [/b] to support battle passes.

For more detailed, organized and explained informations watch these recommended YouTube videos:

"The State of Overwatch 2" by A_Seagull.

"Overwatch 2 is free but I still feel scammed" by zanny.

"Overwatch 2 is a New Low in Gaming" by doob.

"Overwatch 2 is Unacceptable Garbage" by TheWhat Show.

"Overwatch 2: The Laziest Sequel" by The Act Man.

暴雪你妈死了真的
Tengo casi ya 1700 horas de juego en battlenet, solo puedo decir: Nerfeen a genji y que buena que esta la Junker Queen.

Luego de 700hs en el launcher de Blizzard, y con la compra de todos los pases de batallas, sin mencionar que tengo casi 2000 horas en TF2, creo que se merece una reseña este juego por mi parte. Primer punto, es el mismo juego que el primero, pero con más mejoras, y te lo dice alguien que nunca jugó el 1, pero lo consumí bastante en vídeos y streams. Segundo punto, el juego es bastante divertido en su modo competitivo (llegué a máster en DPS y SUPP y diamante alto en Tanke). El tercer punto, que es lo negativo, es la estafa que resultó el supuesto nuevo modo PVE (que fue cancelado) y el cooperativo con amigos prometido, todo eso brilla con su ausencia, el nuevo modo "Invasión", aunque no lo he jugado, puedo afirmar sin equivocarme que no vale la pena, primero porque se van a olvidar de él cuando pasen las semanas y no vas a encontrar partida, segundo porque se va a volver repetitivo a las pocas horas de jugarlo, y tercero porque no hay verdadera motivación para seguir jugando luego de obtener las recompensas. Todo esto es mi humilde opinión, aún así, lo recomiendo.

Я не буду рассказывать о том, как последние 10 лет близзард становятся всё хуже и хуже, как у них в офисе все друг друга насиловали, или как близзард относятся к РФ, всё это вы и без меня знаете, да и мне важен товар, а не его подноготная. В овервотч я играю с 2017, и даже покупал Origins edition за 3300 рублей, я помню всю ту шумиху вокруг неё, и как я будучи фанатом тф2 её ненавидел, а потом полюбил. Я застал первые архивы, и годовщину, ждал хеллоуин, и многое другое, и наиграл за всё время около 700 часов, однако то были дела давно минувших дней, сейчас всё изменилось, даже близзард, которые потеряли какое-либо уважение, а сама игра превратилась в донатную помойку, где за 15 баксов можно купить 3 пве миссии, но есть ещё одна, бесплатная, которая ничем не отличается от сезонных активностей в Destiny 2 (Для тех, кто не знает, там это миссии минут на 15, где ты выполняешь односложные задачки типа убить 5 сильных противников, и отнести выпавшие с них сферы к какой-то штуке, отстреливать врагов, пока идёт открытие двери, и т.д.). Игроки играют тупо на удовольствие, даже в ранкеде, от какой-либо соревновательности, за которую топили близзард не осталось ни следа, прогрессии в игре, кроме батл пасса нет, обновления редкие, копить даже на 1 легендарный скин можно месяцами. Единственное хорошее в этой игре это геймплей, и то, потому-что он был сделан теми, кто хотел сделать хорошую игру
Покойся с миром Overwatch

Overwatch 2 is a shell of it used to be. It has no respect for you, your time and money. It made players miss loot boxes of things , it canceled what the original PVE was supposed to be and what didn't canceled it has the audacity to sell to you. Is a very greedy game, with poor balancing,bugs and toxic community. Until the Microsoft- Activision-Blizzard deal is done( and maybe a while longer since all the talent left Blizzard) I have no interest in a game that doesn't respect me. Go play Team Fortress 2 or Deep Rock Galactic. I just grabbed my achivements and left. Shame. I used to be a Blizzard fan but no one is more than your own

还我国服充的钱还有皮肤！ 没想到到了2023年终于有一个我能理直气壮写测评的游戏了(●ˇ∀ˇ●)
恭喜守望先锋上架steam！
让我想想，该从哪里说起？
从《双龙》？
从“年度最佳游戏”？
从上海龙42连败到冠军？
从济南屁王？
从PVE？
算了，
让我来说一说，阿育陀耶的落日。
阿育陀耶的正中间有一个莲花池，从左边沿着楼梯上去，半透明的白色纱帘飞舞，纱帘后是遥远的群山，和隐匿于群山之后，只留下光芒的太阳。
有时候我会在阿育陀耶的悬崖边坐一晚上，看着夕阳。
或许这不是落日，而是日出？不管如何我是武断地认为这是落日了。
小王子说他最难过的时候看了43次落日。
我的落日呢？
它永远挂在天上，却也永远看不见形状，这样永恒的落日，又是否代表了永恒的泪水呢？
我从暮色四合等到晨曦初露，也没有等到我想要的答案。

2016年的暑假，闷热昏暗的客厅，我悄悄地偷出我爸的笔记本下载了OW，进了游戏后，人物模型模糊的好像我400度的眼镜没带一样，但我居然玩下去了。
在阿努比斯神殿B点正中的三个小门，我拿着Dva和堡垒站在一起，试图将B点大门的敌人打死。
在花村的A点，我拿着小美，狂按左键，试图冻住在钟旁跟我二人转的对手。
我一开始是不屑于玩辅助的，初三的时候总觉得自己会是世界第一DPS，结果错过了天使群拉==
2019年，大家从高中毕业，各奔东西。我终于有了一些可以支配的资金，毫不犹豫地买了OW豪华版，并且开始四处寻找队友。嘿，还真给我找到了。自此我们的玩具车成立。同年OW2的cg让我对这个游戏充满了希望。
2020年，我开始看pva的直播，经常看到半夜，翻来覆去地看云水遥遥写的短篇，为了狙击pva苦练技术但最终也只上了个钻石。
2021年凌晨，我们车队所有人都换了金刀，在游戏里六个金刀源氏一起合影过元旦。
2022年10月2日，天使陪着我在阿育陀耶看着落日，迎来了OW1的谢幕。
2023年1月24日，国服的一切终止在斗兽场的大白旁。

现在已经是2023年8月11日了，是没有PVE的OW2，是全面溃烂的济南屁王，是没有金刀的源氏，是上不去的排位分，没有等级边框的外服，梦一样消散的国服。我也不再在阿育陀耶看落日。

7年，很遥远吗？
7年，是86个月，是2634天，是63240个小时。
7年，却也只是419个字符。
7年过去了，守望先锋的世界一片混乱，我的世界也没有变得更好。
不论如何我确实无法割舍与守望先锋之间的感情了，它参与了我这几年的每一个日夜，一个逐渐变成无聊的大人的人和一个逐渐落寞的游戏，是非常契合的。
守望先锋还是我最喜欢的游戏，但我确实也不再如以前那样喜欢守望先锋。
有时候我打开它，却停留在主页发呆。
什么时候能看到阿育陀耶的日出呢？
会者定离，
一期一祈。
好了，该睡了。
